scripts.create-pangolin-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangolin subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ s2sMappingTokenFactory/pangolin
scripts.remove-pangolin-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangolin subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ s2sMappingTokenFactory/pangolin
scripts.deploy-pangolin-local: cp subgraph.yaml.pangolin subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 s2sMappingTokenFactory/pangolin
scripts.create-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ s2sMappingTokenFactory/crab
scripts.remove-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ s2sMappingTokenFactory/crab
scripts.deploy-crab-local: cp subgraph.yaml.crab subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 s2sMappingTokenFactory/crab
